channel.title: Cache Converting
channel.description: OK, So I have a 317 Project Insanity Client and I would like to have 525+ cache, can someone show me how to convert this 317 to a better quality

item.title: Cache Converting
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Daniel™, post:12, topic:404943”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=501960.msg3672748#msg3672748 date=1311041529]
It would require more than just “converting” the cache format. Not only would you have to add more features to the client (Grand Exchange, etc), you would need to change how the models are rendered, you would need to implement an XTEA key handler for the maps, not to mention rendering the HQ landscape, rasterizing, particles, etc.
[/quote]
o.O too much daamn work[/quote]

Exactly. However, using the tools currently available, you could add most of what you want. New items/objects/npcs packed into the cache(although I wouldn’t suggest shipping the cache (hint: update server)). You could use one of the map editors available to create the new areas. As for the interfaces, you might have a more difficult time, on account of the “event handlers”. Or, you could just make a server for whichever revision you want, instead of adding extra stuff to the 317.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Daniel8 Daniel™
item.description:
@Daniel8 wrote:

[quote=“мonster, post:9, topic:404943”]Yeah but the graphics are only good when everything else is the same revision. Mix and match is un-stylish and distasteful.

Old school is the new school.[/quote]
What about Middle School? :o

item.title: Cache Converting
item.dc:creator: @Daniel8 Daniel™
item.description:
@Daniel8 wrote:

[quote=“мonster, post:7, topic:404943”]There’s a difference between an argument and a debate. I’m not attacking you personally. I’m despising the fact that you condone someone defacing the 317 cache.

Via personal experience, I’ve witnessed too many people claiming to host a 317 server, only to log in to a 508 character.

I’m pleading as to why this is so appealing.

I think the immaturity here is jumping to a conclusion so soon with a -1. There’s more than meets the eye.[/quote]
Graphics man

Read full topic

It’s his decision, stop with these low quality ass posts.

Thanks I guess.

item.title: Cache Converting
item.dc:creator: @Spencer4678 Spencer4678
item.description:
@Spencer4678 wrote:

[quote=“мonster, post:4, topic:404943”]The “Why?” was simply, why do these people want to corrupt the damn 317 caches all the time. Use a real 525.

317 should stay 317, ask any “quality member”, as you put it.

Plus your response doesn’t help him in anyway. You just told him what he wants to do.[/quote]
I gave him a thought. I’m not gonna sit here and argue over the internet. It’s immature, I’m gonna stop replying here, you should do the same.

Read full topic
